statements: DELETE FROM health_records WHERE patient_id=100 AND diagnosis='Flu';
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE id = 5 AND patient_id = 10
DELETE FROM patient_health_records WHERE patient_id = 1 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM health_trends WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM health_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Diet' ORDER BY trend_id DESC)
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM providers WHERE provider_name = 'Dr. Smith';
